column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////FOOD / DRINK: We started with half a dozen oysters
column2: and then had the pork chop and petite filet for our entrees. The filet and pork chop were both incredibly tender and perfectly cooked and seasoned. Each came with mushrooms (included with the pork chop
column3: add on for the filet) that were also excellent! We got the chocolate creme pie to go (we were in a rush) and that was fantastic. Super rich and decadent
column4: and a huge portion! For drinks
column5: we had the gimlet and champagne smash
column6: and both were delicious. They also give you sourdough bread to start with
